author: Tom Nicholas
description:
Please consider helping to support my work at https://patreon.com/tomnicholas

Over the past three months, the British Police have arrested over 2,000 peaceful protestors for doing nothing more than holding signs. I headed to London to speak with Kerry Moscogiuri from Amnesty International UK to find out why.

Directed and Presented by Tom Nicholas.
Filmed and edited by Georgia Burrows.
Additional research and production assistance by Jack Carter.

Watch this video ad- and sponsor-free on Nebula at https://nebula.tv/videos/tomnicholas-why-british-police-arrested-2000-peaceful-protestors

Support my work on Patreon at https://patreon.com/tomnicholas

title: Why British Police Arrested 2,000 Peaceful Protestors
